entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is described as small and skinny, but very fast. He has a thin face, knobbly knees, black hair, bright-green eyes, and wears round glasses held together with Sellotape.

entities.name: dudley
entities.description: Dudley is described as being about four times bigger than Harry. He punches Harry on the nose.

entities.name: petunia
entities.description: Petunia is Harry's aunt who tells him that his scar was from a car crash when his parents died.

relationships.description: Harry is punched on the nose by Dudley.
Petunia is Harry's aunt who takes care of him and tells him about his scar.
